column4: Guys, I am having trouble getting Flash to work. I have downloaded and installed it through the Ubuntu software center but still doesn't seem to work for youtube clips?
I've also tried downloading the YUM and RPM from Adobe.com but I can't install them, the executables only bring up a terminal for one second then close.
John: for more info on using switcheroo, https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HybridGraphics
